Key Match Events: Jonathan David scored 28 international goals for Canada
Luis Suarez denied a big chance after he was unmarked in the box
Alphonso Davies' super strike went just wide
Jonathan David pounced on a loose ball in the box, calmly sliding the ball past Uruguay keeper Sergio Rochet
Post-Match Reflections: Canada captured the hearts of people around the world with brave performances and taking on some of the world's best teams with grace and confidence
This is only the beginning of the journey for Canada
Uruguay may have finished third, but Canada captured the hearts of people around the world with brave performances and taking on some of the world's best teams with grace and confidence
Miscellaneous Highlights: Uruguay is ranked 14th in the world according to FIFA, while Canada is ranked 48th
Canada's ranking surely must change after this tournament is over
The final awaits with Argentina taking on Colombia for the ultimate crown
Others: Canada finish top 4 at the 2024 Copa America
